content: this beginner-friendly crochet throw looks a lot more advanced than it is thanks to the yarn designed in bernat felted you ll enjoy a felt-feel blanket that s worked in alternating single_crochet and chain stitches the moss stitch pattern is a breeze to learn and works up quickly for a satisfying project at a generous 50 x 60 overall size you ll love to curl up in the cozy warmth materials bernat® felted™ 9 2 oz/260 g 249 yds/228 m ecru fleck 80012 or buff 80006 6 balls or 1494 yds/1344 m measurements approximately 50 x 60 127 x 152 5 cm excluding fringe
